# Barge, Large
## Overview
**Barge, Large**

Colossal water vehicle

Squares 40 (20 ft. by 50 ft.); Cost 5,000 gp

**DEFENSE**

**AC** 2; Hardness 5

**hp** 300 (150)

**Base Save** +0

**OFFENSE**

**Maximum Speed** 60 ft. (current) or 40 ft. (muscle);

     **Acceleration** 20 ft. (current) or 5 ft. (muscle)

**CMB** +8; **CMD** 18

**Ramming Damage** 6d8

**DESCRIPTION**

This large flat-bottomed boat is used for river or lake travel. It can carry 40 tons of cargo on top of a full crew and 20 passengers.

**Propulsion** muscle (4 oxen, 6 mules, or other animals on a tow path, or 6 rowers) or current (water)

**Driving Check** [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] or [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] (rowers), [[Profession (Skill)|Profession]] (sailor) under current, or [[Handle Animal (Skill)|Handle Animal]] (under tow) +10 to the DC

**Forward Facing** the shipâ€™s forward

**Driving Device** rudder

**Driving Space** the nine squares around the rudder, typically located in the aft of the ship

**Crew** 5

**Decks** 1

**Weapons** Up to 8 Large direct-fire siege engines in banks of 4 positioned on the port and starboard sides of the ship, or up to 2 Huge direct-fire siege engines in banks of 1 on the port and starboard sides of the ship. The siege engines can only fire out the sides of the ship they are positioned on. They cannot be swiveled to fire toward the forward or aft sides of the ship.

**Source:** Midgard Campaign Setting (Open Design), pg. 51
